short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a screenshot of the current tab viewport and glitch it. Iteration of 'Page Glitcher' by zky829

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hi and welcome to my super cute and fun browser extension for making glitches! I used zky829's Viewport Glitcher as a base and added code of my own to align to my project. My browser extension uses the libraries glitch-canvas and p5. By clicking the browser icon the extension takes a screenshot of your tab and glitches both image and text elements.
